title: Prefix to Infix
statement:
# Prefix to Infix Conversion

Convert a prefix expression to fully parenthesized infix.

## Problem Description

Given a valid prefix expression with single-letter operands and operators (+, -, *, /), convert it to fully parenthesized infix notation.

## Input Format

A single line with space-separated tokens.

## Output Format

The fully parenthesized infix expression.

## Constraints

- Valid prefix expression
- Operands are single uppercase letters
